CustomAssetInfo:
Custom object graphics should be stored in this folder. They must be saved as PNG files, 64 x 96 in size. Once placed here, you may reference these as spriteSets for objects you add to PremadeUnits.xml.
To make your new object use a custom sprite, edit the spriteSet attribute so it reads spriteSet="Custom/X", where X is the name of your sprite. (E.g. if you have placed an image called BlueStatue.png in Object Images, make sure your new object has spriteSet="Custom/BlueStatue").
